Title: greatCircleAngle
Description: Calculates the central angle between two points on the Earth’s surface using the great-circle formula.

lon1Deg — Longitude of the first point in degrees.lat1Deg — Latitude of the first point in degrees.lon2Deg — Longitude of the second point in degrees.lat2Deg — Latitude of the second point in degrees.
The central angle between two points in degrees.
